data.text: I don’t wanna say anything of the story. Just fucking watch the damn movie. Every detail, every scene is fucking worth it. Overall, 9.5/10 for #ReadyPlayerOne. Go watch it ! Believe me you’ll want you watch it again and again and again !
Don’t get me started on the references, my god. As a gamers from child, this movie is so relatable from the plot to the messages shown by him. Goddaym. I feel like i wanna cry when the movie ended.
Oh my god, the setting, the ambiance, the feeling he created as a director really really push me to the edge of my seat when i’m watching it ! Tak tipu one of the best movie ever made !!
